articles.title: Hey there!
articles.contents:
Ijeamaka AnyeneData Analyst



Welcome to my personal site! I am a data analyst working in healthcare research. I specialize in using R and SAS for data analysis, epidemiological research, and data visualizations. I am also passionate about knowledge sharing / dissemination and picking up (and putting down) a multitude of side projects. Check out my most recent projects in my Portfolio tab.



Background


Education
MPH in Epidemiology & Biostatistics
U.C. Berkeley School of Public Health, 2020
BA in Environmental Studies
Yale University, 2015


Recent Roles
Analyst
Kaiser Permanente Division of Research
Consumer Insights
Curology
Senior Operations Associate,Operations Associate
Collective Health
